##### EXERCÍCIO 1
### A série “agro” representa a porcentagem de participação da agropecuária no valor adicionado bruto total da economia brasileira entre os anos de 1947 e 2012.
agro <- ts(c(21.4, 23.4, 24.2, 25.1, 24.6, 25.8, 24.4, 25.0, 24.3, 21.8, 21.2, 19.0, 17.7, 18.3, 17.5, 18.0, 16.5, 16.9, 16.5, 14.8, 14.3, 12.3, 11.9, 12.3, 13.0,
	13.1, 12.6, 12.2, 11.5, 11.7, 13.6, 11.2, 10.8, 10.9, 11.2, 9.7, 12.4, 13.8, 12.6, 12.1, 10.8, 11.4, 9.8, 8.1, 7.8, 7.7, 7.6, 9.9, 5.8, 5.5, 5.4, 5.5, 5.5,
	5.6, 6.0, 6.6, 7.4, 6.9, 5.7, 5.5, 5.6, 5.9, 5.6, 5.3, 5.5, 5.2), start = 1947, frequency = 1)


##### EXERCÍCIO 2
### A série “voo” representa a quantidade mensal de passageiros (em milhares) em voos internacionais entre os anos de 1949 e 1960.
voo <- ts(c(112, 118, 132, 129, 121, 135, 148, 148, 136, 119, 104, 118, 115, 126, 141, 135, 125, 149, 170, 170, 158, 133, 114, 140, 145, 150, 178, 163, 172, 178,
	199, 199, 184, 162, 146, 166, 171, 180, 193, 181, 183, 218, 230, 242, 209, 191, 172, 194, 196, 196, 236, 235, 229, 243, 264, 272, 237, 211, 180, 201, 204,
	188, 235, 227, 234, 264, 302, 293, 259, 229, 203, 229, 242, 233, 267, 269, 270, 315, 364, 347, 312, 274, 237, 278, 284, 277, 317, 313, 318, 374, 413, 405,
	355, 306, 271, 306, 315, 301, 356, 348, 355, 422, 465, 467, 404, 347, 305, 336, 340, 318, 362, 348, 363, 435, 491, 505, 404, 359, 310, 337, 360, 342, 406,
	396, 420, 472, 548, 559, 463, 407, 362, 405, 417, 391, 419, 461, 472, 535, 622, 606, 508, 461, 390, 432), start = 1949, frequency = 12)


##### EXERCÍCIO 3
### A série “ovo” representa a quantidade trimestral (em milhares de dúzias) de ovos de galinha produzida no Brasil por granjas que possuem 10.000 ou
### mais galinhas poedeiras entre o 1º trimestre de 1987 e o 4º trimestre de 2013.
ovo <- ts(c(288856, 292435, 301112, 294227, 295512, 307358, 305742, 304435, 290781, 303794, 311976, 317456, 296583, 310928, 317853, 315864, 318834, 331513, 338989,
	332725, 327831, 339666, 353127, 343064, 337138, 346857, 349115, 348077, 346444, 357960, 361277, 374078, 372915, 384648, 382530, 380976, 355143, 374322,
	378129, 372923, 370386, 377619, 388869, 379334, 382171, 396306, 400805, 381781, 387153, 399267, 398367, 393487, 412589, 416540, 418379, 415205, 402829,
	429211, 441890, 440659, 448294, 453256, 454255, 437860, 440951, 457278, 466091, 465451, 467346, 478017, 488983, 488001, 484402, 499723, 517178, 517049,
	516533, 522181, 540337, 533328, 527194, 537800, 544884, 556028, 559997, 568218, 576647, 576680, 580265, 580999, 598309, 601399, 603727, 610592, 622001,
	621557, 620103, 633902, 650814, 661901, 673166, 673352, 682833, 666125, 670500, 680807, 692740, 696273), start = 1987, frequency = 4)


##### EXERCÍCIO 4
### Produção Trimestral de Bebida nos E.U.A. (milhões de US$)
y<-ts(c(11654, 13723, 13242, 12002, 11502, 13627, 13662, 12155, 12024, 14378, 14070, 13049, 12491, 14861, 15115, 13610, 13318, 15962, 15832, 14554, 13609, 15995,
	16136, 15156, 14393, 16740, 16504, 14745, 14152, 16470, 16091, 14910, 14536, 16901, 16468, 15278, 14829, 17103, 17255, 15952, 14849, 17161, 16979, 15870,
	15294, 17857, 17735, 16910, 16743, 19495, 19424, 17795, 16337, 19761, 19920, 18894, 17680, 20634, 19984, 19483), start = 1992, frequency = 4)


##### EXERCÍCIO 5
### Renda nacional bruta brasileira trimestral em trilhões de reais de 2010 a 2018
y <- ts(c(0.8638625, 0.9132749, 0.9707384, 1.0238919,
	0.9920862, 1.0625939, 1.0803405, 1.1273655,
	1.1133829, 1.1568772, 1.2022584, 1.2400275,
	1.2287048, 1.3126748, 1.3394971, 1.3865180,
	1.3611805, 1.3948969, 1.4336090, 1.4748757,
	1.4327626, 1.4514831, 1.4736331, 1.5084685,
	1.4638448, 1.5352103, 1.5456049, 1.5918321,
	1.5497863, 1.6036824, 1.6072394, 1.6716465,
	1.6209117, 1.6657521, 1.6835262, 1.7535290), start = 2010, frequency = 4)


##### EXERCÍCIO 6
### A série y representa a quantidade de vendas mensal de um dos modelos de cama de uma empresa entre janeiro de 2001 e dezembro de 2012.

y<-ts(c(114, 111, 78, 71, 90, 98, 100, 102, 88, 98, 109, 116, 122, 138, 103, 90, 87, 100, 102, 106, 89, 107, 111, 125, 145, 140, 114, 98, 96, 118, 119, 123, 97, 109,
	117, 145, 156, 141, 125, 112, 99, 128, 124, 125, 119, 120, 129, 151, 166, 146, 133, 117, 104, 131, 129, 135, 128, 126, 113, 160, 175, 151, 145, 127, 114, 140,
	138, 140, 141, 130, 119, 165, 181, 156, 149, 137, 119, 151, 141, 145, 145, 134, 129, 169, 188, 165, 157, 130, 127, 157, 149, 150, 149, 140, 138, 176, 191,
	169, 155, 136, 130, 160, 153, 156, 158, 149, 145, 181, 199, 176, 168, 145, 139, 168, 159, 167, 169, 158, 154, 182, 216, 179, 173, 149, 147, 173, 167, 175,
	178, 171, 159, 203, 238, 188, 179, 158, 159, 188, 177, 184, 185, 179, 169, 211), start = 2001, frequency = 12)


##### EXERCÍCIO 7
### Chuva trimestral, em mm, na fazenda Letreiro em Uberlândia - M.G. entre 1975 e 2014
y<-ts(c(517, 205, 17, 624, 433, 43, 51, 693, 450, 150, 47, 465, 467, 162, 76, 644, 651, 70, 0, 419, 671, 113, 85, 561, 513, 84, 0, 730, 982, 178, 48, 639,
	871, 175, 144, 686, 469, 122, 107, 577, 785, 93, 24, 298, 457, 109, 150, 597, 704, 90, 76, 718, 592, 89, 16, 301, 568, 97, 162, 690, 425, 126, 144, 403,
	700, 99, 21, 454, 856, 201, 116, 886, 624, 132, 87, 701, 635, 93, 13, 544, 799, 174, 37, 453, 537, 104, 127, 453, 677, 164, 39, 792, 585, 165, 54, 428,
	689, 74, 61, 451, 929, 74, 131, 416, 537, 92, 95, 739, 702, 42, 40, 647, 1164, 215, 42, 518, 565, 156, 22, 694, 713, 244, 65, 544, 817, 248, 98, 1120,
	862, 105, 44, 614, 760, 290, 40, 659, 988, 182, 222, 684, 521, 71, 13, 682, 1006, 232, 2, 444, 632, 255, 46, 417, 634, 257, 12, 497, 235, 121, 85, 599),
	start =  1975, frequency = 4)


##### EXERCÍCIO 8
### Quantidade de chuva trimestral (em mm) na cidade de Uberlândia entre 2000 e 2014.
y<-ts(c(929, 74, 131, 416, 537, 92, 95, 739, 702, 42, 40, 647, 1164, 215, 42, 518, 565, 156, 22, 694, 713, 244, 65, 544, 817, 248, 98, 1120, 862, 105, 44, 614,
	760, 290, 40, 659, 988, 182, 222, 684, 521, 71, 13, 682, 1006, 232, 2, 444, 632, 255, 46, 417, 634, 257, 12, 497, 235, 121, 85, 599), start=2000, frequency=4)


##### EXERCÍCIO 9
### Quantidade quadrimestral de chuva (em mm) em Manaus de 1961 a 2007.
### 1º quadrimestre = janeiro a abril; 2º quadrimestre = maio a agosto; 3º quadrimestre = setembro a dezembro
y<-ts(c(1208.8,465.6,672.8,1412.4,450.3,377.8,1000.1,417.8,553.5,1020.6,548.2,719.1,1233.9,361.3,425.0,916.9,753.3,673.7,1481.2,365.5,272.9,1400.2,699.8,
	741.2,1352.3,557.7,402.2,1499.0,427.6,518.0,1426.7,507.4,579.0,1084.3,411.7,409.5,950.4,779.2,797.5,1282.0,522.6,572.8,1316.3,603.9,404.9,1508.4,
	221.9,485.8,1057.9,379.0,579.8,1132.4,516.7,448.3,893.6,208.8,516.4,598.7,188.3,512.6,753.8,274.6,643.5,572.4,303.7,382.6,750.7,440.6,736.6,
	1165.7,521.9,434.5,1215.1,565.4,755.9,1145.9,544.3,784.9,1149.4,293.5,446.6,1336.0,644.7,660.0,1332.0,912.9,868.5,959.6,539.0,363.0,1154.4,699.4,
	294.2,1065.6,360.4,514.2,1653.5,240.6,629.3,1288.8,429.1,584.2,1199.9,435.6,625.9,1595.5,394.5,605.2,1352.2,441.5,545.2,1092.3,574.4,533.7,1326.8,
	660.6,632.9,1570.7,401.6,627.3,967.9,441.2,384.3,1192.7,460.8,668.6,1046.0,541.6,367.3,981.6,744.0,331.3,1236.0,347.6,624.5,1055.1,557.4,710.2,
	1231.2,520.9,591.1), start = 1961, frequency = 3)


##### EXERCÍCIO 10
### Precipitação atmosférica anual (em mm) na cidade de Lavras entre 1966 e 1997.
y = ts(c(1794.0, 1442.7, 1170.4, 1531.0, 1427.2, 1485.2, 1727.2, 1315.6, 1399.0, 1301.0, 1665.1, 1355.8, 1448.4, 1933.2, 1589.1, 1370.0, 1820.3,

##### EXERCÍCIO 17
### Quantidade quadrimestral de chuva (em mm) em Manaus de 1961 a 2007.
### 1º quadrimestre = janeiro a abril; 2º quadrimestre = maio a agosto; 3º quadrimestre = setembro a dezembro
y = ts(c(1208.8,465.6,672.8,1412.4,450.3,377.8,1000.1,417.8,553.5,1020.6,548.2,719.1,1233.9,361.3,425.0,916.9,753.3,673.7,1481.2,365.5,272.9,1400.2,699.8,
	741.2,1352.3,557.7,402.2,1499.0,427.6,518.0,1426.7,507.4,579.0,1084.3,411.7,409.5,950.4,779.2,797.5,1282.0,522.6,572.8,1316.3,603.9,404.9,1508.4,
	221.9,485.8,1057.9,379.0,579.8,1132.4,516.7,448.3,893.6,208.8,516.4,598.7,188.3,512.6,753.8,274.6,643.5,572.4,303.7,382.6,750.7,440.6,736.6,
	1165.7,521.9,434.5,1215.1,565.4,755.9,1145.9,544.3,784.9,1149.4,293.5,446.6,1336.0,644.7,660.0,1332.0,912.9,868.5,959.6,539.0,363.0,1154.4,699.4,
	294.2,1065.6,360.4,514.2,1653.5,240.6,629.3,1288.8,429.1,584.2,1199.9,435.6,625.9,1595.5,394.5,605.2,1352.2,441.5,545.2,1092.3,574.4,533.7,1326.8,
	660.6,632.9,1570.7,401.6,627.3,967.9,441.2,384.3,1192.7,460.8,668.6,1046.0,541.6,367.3,981.6,744.0,331.3,1236.0,347.6,624.5,1055.1,557.4,710.2,
	1231.2,520.9,591.1), start = 1961, frequency = 3)
